isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR CHECK BRACKET

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Check Bracket on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 48
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the front cab door check Bracket (Item 3) at the cab hinge pillar (Item 4) and install two torx head bolts (Item 2) through front cab door check bracket and thread into cab hinge pillar, driver side shown. Use a torx head tool (Item 1) and tighten to 8 to 10 lbf-ft (11 to 13.6 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door check bracket.

svcsubproc.title: Install Crew Cab Rear Door Check Bracket on Crew Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 49
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the crew cab rear door check bracket (Item 3) at the crew cab B - pillar (Item 4) and install two torx head bolts (Item 2) through crew cab rear door check bracket and thread into crew cab B - pillar, driver side shown. Use a torx head tool (Item 1) and tighten to 8 to 10 lbf-ft (11 to 13.6 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side crew cab rear door check bracket.
